title: Boykisser

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: During any phase, select a boy to kiss

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you kiss a boy during the day, they will secretly gain an extra vote, but it will take them one less vote to hang them the next day
- If you kiss a boy during the night, their defense will be raised by one, but set to none the following night.
- Boys are players that have a male gender identity, let it be cis or trans
- If you've somehow managed to kiss every boy alive at the end of the game, you will leave the town since there are no more boys left to kiss.
- Once you win, the boys you kissed will be asked if they like kissing boys. This is just a message sent into their channel without any further context.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have one boy you kissed during the day assist in hanging someone AND protect a boy with your kiss.

desc:
Post 4113
*You like kissing boys, don't you?*
